add_library(infineon-lwip OBJECT)

target_sources(infineon-lwip
        PRIVATE
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port/netif/ethernetif.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port/sys/memcpy.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port/sys/net.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port/sys/sys_arch_freertos.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port/sys/sys_arch_nosys.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api/api_lib.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api/api_msg.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api/err.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api/if_api.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api/netbuf.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api/netdb.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api/netifapi.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api/sockets.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api/tcpip.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/apps/http/altcp_proxyconnect.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/apps/http/fs.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/apps/http/httpd.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/apps/http/http_client.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/altcp.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/altcp_alloc.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/altcp_tcp.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/def.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/dns.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/inet_chksum.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/init.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ip.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv4/acd.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv4/autoip.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv4/dhcp.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv4/etharp.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv4/icmp.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv4/igmp.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv4/ip4.c

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv4/ip4_frag.c

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/ppp/polarssl/md5.c

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/ppp/ppp.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/ppp/pppapi.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/ppp/pppcrypt.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/ppp/pppoe.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/ppp/pppol2tp.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/ppp/pppos.c

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/slipif.c
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/zepif.c
        PUBLIC

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/compat/stdc/errno.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/lwip/acd.h

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp/ppp.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp/pppapi.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp/pppcrypt.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp/pppdebug.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp/pppoe.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp/pppol2tp.h

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp/upap.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp/vj.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/slipif.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/zepif.h
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lwipopts.h
)

target_include_directories(infineon-lwip
        PUBLIC
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port/include"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port/include/arch"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port/netif"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/port/sys"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/api"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/apps"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/apps/http"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv4"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/core/ipv6"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/compat"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/compat/posix"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/compat/posix/arpa"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/compat/posix/net"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/compat/posix/sys"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/compat/stdc"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/lwip"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/apps"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/priv"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/prot"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/include/netif/ppp/polarssl"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/ppp"
        "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/netif/ppp/polarssl"
)

target_link_libraries(infineon-lwip infineon-board infineon-std)
